tns:patch.author: Constantin Dolghier
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_components AS SELECT aac.amp_activity_id, c.title AS title, c.amp_component_id AS amp_component_id, f.rep_organization_id AS component_rep_org_id, f.component_second_rep_org_id AS component_second_rep_org_id, c.type AS component_type_id FROM amp_activity_components aac JOIN amp_components c ON aac.amp_component_id = c.amp_component_id LEFT JOIN amp_component_funding f ON c.amp_component_id = f.amp_component_id;
